adversarial_findings.summary: Temporal provenance inconsistencies were identified in earlier day3 bundle revision.
adversarial_findings.risk: Chain-of-custody trust loss if timestamps are non-monotonic.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Rebuild with monotonic timestamps and per-write lineage evidence.

adversarial_findings.summary: Immutable adjudication log append path was missing in earlier revision.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Append validated rows to immutable versioned log and record provenance.

adversarial_findings.summary: Noisy TOC/index witnesses required quarantine from training export.
adversarial_findings.risk: Training contamination from non clause-local spans.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Apply hard pre-filter and quarantine affected rows.

adversarial_findings.summary: Red-team placeholder routing semantics were ambiguous in pre-red-team state.
adversarial_findings.required_action: Use explicit in-review status with concrete adversarial artifact pointer.
